modName: Crazy Magician Glass Robe for CBBE TBBP with BODYSLIDE
summary: Crazy magician glass robe converted for CBBE bodytype with TBBP support and bodysliders
descriptionHtml:
This is the Crazy Magician Glass Robe for CBBE, using CBBE++ Body Slider with TBBP

I saw the body conversion that Melodiq did with the Sevenbase body, and using Melodiq's files and Outfit Studio, converted it to CBBE with TBBP weights. The original mesh was created by Newmiller.

I've also included the Slider files needed to modify the body yourself with Bodyslide, and create your own body. PLEASE READ THE BODY SLIDE INFO below on important details to avoid issues, and what presets I used, and should do to tweak yours.



[size=3][color=red][b][u]Required :[/u][/b][/color][/size]

CBBE Body - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?
XP32 Skeleton (or other TBBP compatible skeleton) - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?


[size=3][color=yellow][b]## UPDATE ##[/b][/color][/size]
v 1.05 - Included Standalone Installation (Newmiller's download was removed)

v 1.04 - Added Opal Color.

v 1.03 - Fixed an issue with breast flatness for TBBP.

v 1.02 - Included a CBBE non TBBP version for those who don't have, or want the jiggly action. Contains sliders for both CBBE, and CBBE with TBBP so you can convert back and forth at will.

v 1.01 - Now supports more extreme breast morphs. Some of the CB++/CBBE Advanced morphs caused breast clipping.

v 1 - Mod Released


[size=3][b][u]Installing :[/u][/b][/size]

1) Download Standalone with NMM or download manually.

2) If downloaded manually, place files from the data folder into your Skyrim\Data folder.


[size=3][b][u]BodySlide Info : [/u][/b][/size]

Download Bodyslide 2 and Outfit Studio - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?

Use this to modify the body with the sliders included to your heart's content. MageGlassRobeTBBP is the opaque robe, while MageGlassRobeTrTBBP is the transparent robe (tr for transparent in name).

The body it came with is using CB++ TBBP preset that is included. If using TBBP, use CB++ TBBP-fix for now. If using your own preset, make sure your preset uses -40% to -60% on breast flatness slider to make sure you don't have a "squished"/flatter breasts appearance than normal. Regular CBBE doesn't have this issue.

Should be fixed in a later update with bodyslide is updated. Big thank you to the forums on finding this issue...



Credits for original dress to newmiller
Credits for creating the files I used to convert from Sevenbase to CBBE to Melodic
Credits for CBBE body to Caliente
Credits for Fair Skin Complexion to HHaleyy
Credits for ENB used in screenshots to SkyrimTuner, using RealVision ENB - Option B

Special credits for creators of Outfit Studio:
Caliente.
Ousnius.
ChronoTrigger77.
stuffed_bunny.

Special thank you as well Ousnius for helping me on the forums in your OS Tutorial: "Anything to Anything" conversion thread.
author: Sylis
